title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Doug Gottlieb steps in to give his thoughts on Bruce Arians stepping down as head coach of the Buccaneers and why Tom Brady absolutely played a role in this. He shares his plan for how the Lakers can rebuild next season after a disappointing year. Plus, Texas Head Coach Chris Beard and Oklahoma Head Coach Porter Moser join the show live from New Orleans to preview the Final Four. 

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
